description:
With the athleticism of a trail runner and the stability of a hiking shoe, the 334 Circle GTX provide you the comfort and traction to tackle the trails. The waterproof construction and elasticized tongue keep water and debris out, so you can explore the mountains rain or shine.

  • Microfibre upper breathes well and wicks moisture
  • Designed for female ergonomics and biomechanics
  • GORE-TEX® Extended Comfort waterproof-breathable membrane keeps water out
  • EVA midsole combines cushioning and support
  • Polyurethane-coated rands add abrasion and weather protection
  • Vibram Megagrip rubber wears well and grips in wet or dry conditions
name: Zamberlan 334 Circe Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Women's
